WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I tried to get all xpaths in a WebForm application. 
Every WebForm app has of course its form element.
We have following structure:
html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[1]/ul[1]

but when I crawl this page, I get the same xpath WITHOUT form. I found out because I tried to put the xpath into the chrome console (using $x()) and it never worked...
